EmailTemplate.name: CIO/CEO LEAD
EmailTemplate.subject: Executive Introduction
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
I hope this email finds you well.
Two of the founders of VMTurbo (Shmuel Kliger and Yuri Rabover) would like to know if you would be interested in a philosophical conversation regarding the “Holistic View” management of the DC. They have a similar, if not mirrored view and were interested in how you formed your theories and a general conversation regarding virtualization. If you are open to this, please let me know a few times that would work and I will connect you with Shmuel and Yuri.
Regards,
Jacob
Mobile-845 532 7595
